name: Cat Scream
description:
Are you ready for new trend? Very fun and addictive gameplay.

Scare that cat and make him fly like rocket.
Great game with addictive voice control.

Very simple to play!
Just scream to make that cat jump!
Most scary shout will boost to win!

Try to reach the top of the leaderboard Game Services!
publishers: ZUUKS BILISIM HIZMETLERI SANAYI VE TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
